acceptedContracts().details: The contact name listed in this method is also needed to be listed `requiredContracts` method.

deposit(bytes32,uint256).details: Deposits funds by the caller into the token vault as reserve fund.

executeTransaction(address,bytes).details: Executes an arbitrary transaction by Secured Finance admin.

params._data: Encoded function data to be executed

executeTransactions(address[],uint256[],.details: Executes arbitrary transactions by Secured Finance admin.

params._data: Encoded function data to be executed
params._targets: Array of Addresses to be called
params._values: Array of values to be sent to _targets addresses

initialize(address,address,address).details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._nativeToken: The address of wrapped token of native currency
params._owner: The address of the contract owner
params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

returns._0: The boolean if the reserve fund is paused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).details: Withdraw funds by the caller from the token vault.

acceptedContracts().notice: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

isPaused().notice: Gets if the reserve fund is paused.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

userdoc.notice: Implements managing of the reserve fund.
